statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ -6 \\ 4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 10 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ -7 \\ -16 \\ 13 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ -6 \\ 4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 10 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ -7 \\ -16 \\ 13 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
